description.value:
When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crystalline Dust], you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10-foot-radius} cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait.

All creatures within the cloud become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed], and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.
